casebody.data:
Argued and submitted March 25, reversed and remanded April 28, STATE OF OREGON, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. HEATHER DAWN SHEARER, Defendant-Respondent. 210506967, 210506289; A141195 (Control), A141196 230 P3d 82 Leigh A. Salmon, Assistant Attorney General, argued the cause for appellant. With her on the brief were John R. Kroger, Attorney General, and Jerome Lidz, Solicitor General. Zachary L. Mazer, Deputy Public Defender, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief was Peter Gartlan, Chief Defender, Office of Public Defense Services. PER CURIAM

petition for review denied August 18, 2010 (348 Or 669)

Lane County Circuit Court

Before Schuman, Presiding Judge, and Wollheim, Judge, and Rosenblum, Judge.
